ExploreFact.Text: A set of Nomai students were assigned a project to prepare this star system to be their clan's entry in a festival. They had to propose 6 requirements that the system would fulfill in order to demonstrate their understanding of the mechanisms of natural star systems.
Any two planets that share an orbit must be on opposite sides of the sun.
Multiple planets in the system must have sand.
The system must contain an exposed dried seabed.

Solid ice must be present on a planet in the system. The system's star is too hot to allow ice to re-freeze even in the furthest orbit. A Nomai named Adonsonia proposed somehow blocking the star's heat from reaching the planet they want to freeze.
The warp transmitter must be aligned with at least one receiver.

Once all 5 requirements are met, the project must be submitted in the core of "Glacial Abyss!". A Nomai named Alnus pointed out that it is impossible to reach the core using quantum entanglement while all the other project requirements are met.
The station contains an orrery of the system. A Nomai named Oryza claims the system is a scaled-up representation of the orrery.
There are warp transmitters connected to the station on the north pole of most planets in the system.
